22#include <sys/cdefs.h>
23#ifndef lint
24__RCSID("$NetBSD: print-ripng.c,v 1.7 2017/09/08 14:01:13 christos Exp $");
25#endif
26
27/* \summary: IPv6 Routing Information Protocol (RIPng) printer */
28
29#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
30#include "config.h"
31#endif
32
33#include <netdissect-stdinc.h>
34
35#include "netdissect.h"
36#include "addrtoname.h"
37#include "extract.h"
38

58 * ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE PROJECT OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE

67#define RIP6_VERSION 1
68
69#define RIP6_REQUEST 1
70#define RIP6_RESPONSE 2
71
72struct netinfo6 {
73 struct in6_addr rip6_dest;
74 uint16_t rip6_tag;
75 uint8_t rip6_plen;
76 uint8_t rip6_metric;
77};
78
79struct rip6 {
80 uint8_t rip6_cmd;
81 uint8_t rip6_vers;
82 uint8_t rip6_res1[2];
83 union {
84 struct netinfo6 ru6_nets[1];
85 char ru6_tracefile[1];
86 } rip6un;
87#define rip6_nets rip6un.ru6_nets
88#define rip6_tracefile rip6un.ru6_tracefile
89};
90
91#define HOPCNT_INFINITY6 16
92
93#if !defined(IN6_IS_ADDR_UNSPECIFIED) && !defined(_MSC_VER) /* MSVC inline */
94static int IN6_IS_ADDR_UNSPECIFIED(const struct in6_addr *addr)
95{
96 static const struct in6_addr in6addr_any; /* :: */
97 return (memcmp(addr, &in6addr_any, sizeof(*addr)) == 0);
98}
99#endif
100
101static int
102rip6_entry_print(netdissect_options *ndo, register const struct netinfo6 *ni, int metric)
103{
104 int l;
105 l = ND_PRINT((ndo, "%s/%d", ip6addr_string(ndo, &ni->rip6_dest), ni->rip6_plen));
106 if (ni->rip6_tag)
107 l += ND_PRINT((ndo, " [%d]", EXTRACT_16BITS(&ni->rip6_tag)));
108 if (metric)
109 l += ND_PRINT((ndo, " (%d)", ni->rip6_metric));
110 return l;
111}
112
113void
114ripng_print(netdissect_options *ndo, const u_char *dat, unsigned int length)
115{
116 register const struct rip6 *rp = (const struct rip6 *)dat;
117 register const struct netinfo6 *ni;
118 unsigned int length_left;
119 u_int j;
120
121 ND_TCHECK(rp->rip6_cmd);
122 switch (rp->rip6_cmd) {
123
124 case RIP6_REQUEST:
125 length_left = length;
126 if (length_left < (sizeof(struct rip6) - sizeof(struct netinfo6)))
127 goto trunc;
128 length_left -= (sizeof(struct rip6) - sizeof(struct netinfo6));
129 j = length_left / sizeof(*ni);
130 if (j == 1) {
131 ND_TCHECK(rp->rip6_nets);
132 if (rp->rip6_nets->rip6_metric == HOPCNT_INFINITY6
133 && IN6_IS_ADDR_UNSPECIFIED(&rp->rip6_nets->rip6_dest)) {
134 ND_PRINT((ndo, " ripng-req dump"));
135 break;
136 }
137 }
138 if (j * sizeof(*ni) != length_left)
139 ND_PRINT((ndo, " ripng-req %u[%u]:", j, length));
140 else
141 ND_PRINT((ndo, " ripng-req %u:", j));
142 for (ni = rp->rip6_nets; length_left >= sizeof(*ni);
143 length_left -= sizeof(*ni), ++ni) {
144 ND_TCHECK(*ni);
145 if (ndo->ndo_vflag > 1)
146 ND_PRINT((ndo, "\n\t"));
147 else
148 ND_PRINT((ndo, " "));
149 rip6_entry_print(ndo, ni, 0);
150 }
151 if (length_left != 0)
152 goto trunc;
153 break;
154 case RIP6_RESPONSE:
155 length_left = length;
156 if (length_left < (sizeof(struct rip6) - sizeof(struct netinfo6)))
157 goto trunc;
158 length_left -= (sizeof(struct rip6) - sizeof(struct netinfo6));
159 j = length_left / sizeof(*ni);
160 if (j * sizeof(*ni) != length_left)
161 ND_PRINT((ndo, " ripng-resp %d[%u]:", j, length));
162 else
163 ND_PRINT((ndo, " ripng-resp %d:", j));
164 for (ni = rp->rip6_nets; length_left >= sizeof(*ni);
165 length_left -= sizeof(*ni), ++ni) {
166 ND_TCHECK(*ni);
167 if (ndo->ndo_vflag > 1)
168 ND_PRINT((ndo, "\n\t"));
169 else
170 ND_PRINT((ndo, " "));
171 rip6_entry_print(ndo, ni, ni->rip6_metric);
172 }
173 if (length_left != 0)
174 goto trunc;
175 break;
176 default:
177 ND_PRINT((ndo, " ripng-%d ?? %u", rp->rip6_cmd, length));
178 break;
179 }
180 ND_TCHECK(rp->rip6_vers);
181 if (rp->rip6_vers != RIP6_VERSION)
182 ND_PRINT((ndo, " [vers %d]", rp->rip6_vers));
183 return;
184
185trunc:
186 ND_PRINT((ndo, "[|ripng]"));
187 return;
188}
